nelsonObject

nelson object callable from QML.

Syntax

nelson.disp(msg)
nelson.evaluate(cmd)
nelson.processevent()
nelson.call(function_name)
nelson.call(function_name, arg1, ..., arg5)

Input argument

msg

a string.

cmd

a string.

function_name

a string: nelson function name to call

arg1, ..., arg5

javascript variables

Description

nelson object contains some methods used as callback to call nelson from QML

See also

qml_pluginpathlist, qml_addimportpath.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
